mapper.select: SELECT PROJECT_SEQ, PROJECT_NM, PROJECT_START_DATE, PROJECT_END_DATE, PROJECT_ROLE, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM TB_COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_GROUP_ID = 'ROLE' AND CODE_ID = PJ.PROJECT_ROLE) AS PROJECT_ROLE_NM, PROJECT_CLIENT, ASSIGNED_TASK_LAR, ASSIGNED_TASK_MID, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM TB_COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_GROUP_ID = 'TASK' AND CODE_ID = PJ.ASSIGNED_TASK_LAR) AS ASSIGNED_TASK_LAR_NM, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM TB_COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_GROUP_ID = 'TASK' AND CODE_ID = PJ.ASSIGNED_TASK_MID) AS ASSIGNED_TASK_MID_NM FROM TB_PROJECT_INFO PJ WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
SELECT QUALIFICATION_SEQ, QUALIFICATION_NM, ISSUER, ACQUISITION_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE FROM TB_USER_QUALIFICATION_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT WORK_SEQ, WORK_PLACE, WORK_START_DATE, WORk_END_DATE FROM TB_WORK_EXPERIENCE_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT PJ.PROJECT_SEQ, PJ.PROJECT_NM, SK.SKILL_ID, SK.SKILL_NM FROM TB_PROJECT_INFO PJ LEFT JOIN TB_USER_SKILL_INFO SK ON PJ.USER_ID = SK.USER_ID AND PJ.PROJECT_SEQ = SK.PROJECT_SEQ AND SK.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE PJ.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND PJ.PROJECT_SEQ = #{project_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER_PROFILE_INFO SET USER_POSITION = #{user_position}, USER_BIRTH = #{user_birth}, USER_DEPARTMENT = #{user_department}, USER_PHONE = #{user_phone}, USER_ADDRESS = #{user_address}, FILE_SEQ = #{file_seq}, EDU1_SCHOOL_NAME = #{edu1_school_name}, EDU1_GRAD_STATUS = #{edu1_grad_status}, EDU1_START_DATE = #{edu1_start_date}, EDU1_END_DATE = #{edu1_end_date}, EDU1_GUBUN = #{edu1_gubun}, EDU2_SCHOOL_NAME = #{edu2_school_name}, EDU2_GRAD_STATUS = #{edu2_grad_status}, EDU2_START_DATE = #{edu2_start_date}, EDU2_END_DATE = #{edu2_end_date}, EDU2_GUBUN = #{edu2_gubun}, EDU3_SCHOOL_NAME = #{edu3_school_name}, EDU3_GRAD_STATUS = #{edu3_grad_status}, EDU3_START_DATE = #{edu3_start_date}, EDU3_END_DATE = #{edu3_end_date}, EDU3_GUBUN = #{edu3_gubun}, MAJOR = #{major}, DOUBLE_MAJOR = #{double_major}, TOTAL_GRADE = #{total_grade}, STANDARD_GRADE = #{standard_grade}, MODIFIED_DATE = sysdate(), MODIFIER = #{user_id} WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER_PROFILE_INFO_HIST(USER_ID, HIST_SEQ, USER_NM, USER_POSITION, USER_BIRTH, USER_DEPARTMENT, HIRE_DATE, USER_PHONE, USER_ADDRESS, FILE_SEQ, EDU1_SCHOOL_NAME, EDU1_GRAD_STATUS, EDU1_START_DATE, EDU1_END_DATE, EDU1_GUBUN, EDU2_SCHOOL_NAME, EDU2_GRAD_STATUS, EDU2_START_DATE, EDU2_END_DATE, EDU2_GUBUN, EDU3_SCHOOL_NAME, EDU3_GRAD_STATUS, EDU3_START_DATE, EDU3_END_DATE, EDU3_GUBUN, MAJOR, DOUBLE_MAJOR, TOTAL_GRADE, STANDARD_GRADE, CREATE_DATE, CREATOR) SELECT USER_ID, #{hist_seq}, USER_NM, USER_POSITION, USER_BIRTH, USER_DEPARTMENT, HIRE_DATE, USER_PHONE, USER_ADDRESS, FILE_SEQ, EDU1_SCHOOL_NAME, EDU1_GRAD_STATUS, EDU1_START_DATE, EDU1_END_DATE, EDU1_GUBUN, EDU2_SCHOOL_NAME, EDU2_GRAD_STATUS, EDU2_START_DATE, EDU2_END_DATE, EDU2_GUBUN, EDU3_SCHOOL_NAME, EDU3_GRAD_STATUS, EDU3_START_DATE, EDU3_END_DATE, EDU3_GUBUN, MAJOR, DOUBLE_MAJOR, TOTAL_GRADE, STANDARD_GRADE, sysdate(), #{user_id} FROM TB_USER_PROFILE_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

INSERT INTO TB_PROJECT_INFO(USER_ID, PROJECT_SEQ, PROJECT_NM, PROJECT_START_DATE, PROJECT_END_DATE, PROJECT_ROLE, PROJECT_CLIENT, ASSIGNED_TASK_LAR, ASSIGNED_TASK_MID, CREATE_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, CREATOR, MODIFIER) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{project_seq}, #{project_nm}, #{project_start_date}, #{project_end_date}, #{project_role}, #{project_client}, #{assigned_task_lar}, #{assigned_task_mid}, sysdate(), sysdate(), #{user_id}, #{user_id} )

INSERT INTO TB_PROJECT_INFO_HIST(USER_ID, PROJECT_SEQ, HIST_SEQ, PROJECT_NM, PROJECT_START_DATE, PROJECT_END_DATE, PROJECT_ROLE, PROJECT_CLIENT, ASSIGNED_TASK_LAR, ASSIGNED_TASK_MID, CREATE_DATE, CREATOR) SELECT user_id, project_seq, #{hist_seq}, project_nm, project_start_date, project_end_date, project_role, project_client, assigned_task_lar, assigned_task_mid, sysdate(), #{user_id} FROM TB_PROJECT_INFO WHERE project_seq = #{project_seq}

INSERT INTO TB_USER_QUALIFICATION_INFO_HIST(USER_ID, QUALIFICATION_SEQ, HIST_SEQ, QUALIFICATION_NM, ISSUER, ACQUISITION_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE, CREATED_DATE, CREATOR) SELECT USER_ID, QUALIFICATION_SEQ, #{hist_seq}, QUALIFICATION_NM, ISSUER, ACQUISITION_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE, SYSDATE(), #{user_id} FROM TB_USER_QUALIFICATION_INFO WHERE QUALIFICATION_SEQ = #{qualification_seq}

INSERT INTO TB_WORK_EXPERIENCE_INFO(USER_ID, WORK_SEQ, WORK_PLACE, WORK_START_DATE, WORK_END_DATE, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, CREATOR, MODIFIER) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{work_seq}, #{work_place}, #{work_start_date}, #{work_end_date}, sysdate(), sysdate(), #{user_id}, #{user_id} )

INSERT INTO TB_WORK_EXPERIENCE_INFO_HIST(user_id, work_seq, hist_seq, work_place, work_start_date, work_end_date, created_date, creator) SELECT USER_ID, WORK_SEQ, #{hist_seq}, WORK_PLACE, WORK_START_DATE, WORK_END_DATE, SYSDATE(), #{user_id} FROM TB_WORK_EXPERIENCE_INFO WHERE WORK_SEQ = #{work_seq}
